name: Tiny Sad Kraken
description:
A 2d top down action game where you must help a tiny sad kraken back to the sea to reunite with it's mother.

Swim around and grow stronger as you devour ships and their crews, watch out for stars and keep going until you are strong enough to break the dam separating you from the ocean.

Submitted for LudumDare 33, theme: "You are the monster"
